resources.string: Tap\'n\'Hold the result to edit the text ...
The result has been copied to clipboard. PASTE it in your app of chice.
Xsseract just decoded the following image for me

Some of the sharing options don\'t allow sending the result as text (i.e. Facebook), so I\'ve copied the text to the clipboard for you to PASTE in the target app. Sorry for the added effort, but this is out of my hands.
